results.title: [Management of hyperglycemia in the non-critical hospitalized patients with oral feeding].
results.text_hl: Standing out in the physical examination was blood pressure 90/50 mmHg, temperature 38.6  C, pulse 112/min, respirations 24/min, weight 8 5 kg, height 1.68 m. She had @<m>DISEASE_Respiratory_Sounds</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012135 @@@crackling rales@@@ in the right lung-base and @DISEASE_Edema @DISEASE_MESH:D004487 @@@edema@@@ in lower limbs.
